issue.title: Create front end UI to display and summarize information about nightly jobs branches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13765](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13765). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Consume github api to obtain branch per query filter
   \* Consume gitgub api to obtain info about actions / check status per branch job status

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13765?focusedCommentId=17417824) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Oh, this is exciting! Is there a link to this UI that's up now?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13765?focusedCommentId=17418198) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
Hi `[~jonkeane]`  this is WIP-FE: <https://arrow-nightly-jobs.web.app/> 

 

We are working to add more detail as needed: datediff , number of fails, ...
